description:
A popular and beautiful teacher at school, who is adored by most female students. She does not only teach music but is also the advisor for the wind instruments club.
Since she does not want people to know she wanted to be in a heavy metal band in the past, she becomes the advisor of the light music club, though it is unknown whether she stopped being the adviser for the wind instrument club as well. She enjoys cosplaying in the light music club. Her surname is taken from Sawao Yamanaka, the lead vocalist and rhythm guitarist for The Pillows.
name: Yamanaka Sawako
